name: Stroke Ball Lite
description:
- Draw strokes on the game area to direct the balls in the goals of the corresponding color, before the time runs out.
- Different kinds of tiles, e.g. some tiles will break when hit by a ball of the right color, some tiles will change
change the balls color, some tiles can pass balls in only one direction.
- Levels in three difficulty categories : Easy, Medium and Hard.
- Some levels are breakout type of games, other more puzzle like...
- In game high scores.
- Listen to your own music while playing.

Full version has many more levels.

Keywords : InkBall breakout ink touch puzzle
